nubbsgalore photos by martin rak in the czech









nubbsgalore:

photos by martin rak in the czech republic of a temperature inversion, created when fog formed from the heavy, colder air of melting snow becomes trapped by a lid of warmer air.

typography music


typostrate:

Video Wednesday 59

Left handed lettering seems to be quite impossible. That it’s not, is showing us Matt Vergotis, designer, founder of verg and lettering lover from Cold Coast, Australia. His philosophy is simple but deep: “Do what you love.” He is one burning graphic designer with the attitude that the client must love what he gets from him. If he doesn’t the job is not done good. What do you think?

Par Olivier

le 17/12/2014 — Permalien

typography music


Toronto Skyline Porn

Toronto Skyline Porn is what its title implies – a full frontal visual journey through Toronto’s growing skyline. The scenes were shot over the past few years from different heights and in different seasons. 

Ive enjoyed showcasing Toronto in the past in a more warmhearted tone but with the evolution of the city over the last 4 years I figured a skyline short was fitting.

I used a modified GoPro on a DJI Phantom 2 for the aerial shots. All other scenes were captured with a Canon 5DM3.

Music: 
Schoolboy Q / 20syl remix - soundcloud.com/20syl/schoolboy-q-20syl
Yahtzel - soundcloud.com/yahtzel/girls

All inquiries: ryanEEmond@gmail.com
Website: reemond.com

Par Olivier
